value.title: Introducing Power BI Embedded Step by Step Series
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Embedded Step by Step series. Myself Dhruvin Shah. The entire series is dedicated to the Intermediate level of Power BI folks. The series covers step by step guide to embed the Power BI report in any third-party custom application or SaaS application.  This is Intermediate Level of

value.title: Search bar in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: During this February 2021 Power BI Desktop Update, Microsoft rolled out one new feature where we can Search for different actions from Power BI Desktop. Now, we have a new search bar in Power BI Desktop. Based on the current report’s state,  this will show appropriate actions here. Stay tuned throughout

value.title: Small Multiples in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session on Small Multiples in Power BI. “Small Multiples”- a new feature rolled out during December 2020 Power BI Desktop Update. Small Multiples is available as a Preview feature at this moment. This is a very cool feature we can use with our stacked bar and column charts,

value.title: Use Page Navigation Action for Button to Navigate from One Page to Another in Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, about newly introduced action type for buttons which is “Page Navigation”. value.title: 3 steps to do an IT Admin Takeover for Power BI and Office 365
value.excerpt: In this video, I revisit how to perform an IT Admin takeover for your tenant. This could just be a tenant that you did an individual sign up for Power BI with.  I walk through the 3 main steps to perform the takeover. Doing the takeover doesn't cost you anything. For more detail on the cost of Power

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together. From the Power BI mobile app, to pinning visualizations to a dashboard and how Reporting Services handles Power BI Desktop files.  #PowerBI #SSRS  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. value.title: Power BI Drillthrough Updates
value.excerpt: Did you know there were Power BI drillthrough updates? In this video, Patrick looks at the drillthrough updates in Power BI Desktop. This includes Keep All Filters which will pass the filters on your parent page to the drillthrough page.   LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube
